simmasto0.util

Class C_ConvertRainFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • simmasto0.util.C_ConvertRainFiles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_ConstantGerbil, I_ConstantString

    public class C_ConvertRainFiles
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_ConstantString, I_ConstantGerbil
    Read the rain bitmaps, rescale colors and save the grid in ASCII
    Author:
    M.Sall 10.2015, rev. MS&JLF 04.2016
